guidance: The category of datafile. These categories are steadily maturing, but please see an expert user if the relevant category isn't present.
The classification of the object. You can search for a classification if it's not listed. If it's not found, please see an expert user if the relevant classification isn't present.
The Datafile Resolver. It asks for the classification of the datafile and saves the datafile to the database.

The Platform Resolver. Allows the user to select a platform from existing ones in the database or to add a new platform.  Options are provided to skip the provision of supporting metadata for platforms when necessary.
The Sensor Resolver. Allows the user to select a sensor from existing ones in the database or to add a new sensor .
Search platform by its name, identifier, or nationality. If entered name is not found, you will be redirected to adding a new platform prompt.
Add a new platform by typing platform name, identifier, trigraph, quadgraph; choosing nationality, platform type, and classification respectively.
Add a new sensor by answering/choosing/creating sensor name, sensor type, and classification respectively.
Search sensor by its name. If entered name is not found, you will be redirected to adding a new sensor prompt.

The nationality of the platform. Note: while a platform may have a fictional nation created for exercise purposes - this should be the true nation it belongs to. The fictional role undertaken by it should be captured within the Participation data.
The type of platform. These categories are steadily maturing, but please see an expert user if the relevant category isn't present.
The type of sensor. These categories are steadily maturing, but please see an expert user if the relevant category isn't present.
Search classification by name.
Search the category of datafile by name. Please see an expert user if the relevant category isn't present.
Search the category of platform by name. Please see an expert user if the relevant category isn't present.
Specify the type of sensor.
Specifythe nationality of this platform

Add platform name as a synonym. Warning: This should only be done when platform name is a completely unique identifier for this platform not a name that could be shared across platforms of different nationalities.
You did not select an existing value. Please search again.

The identifier of platform, such as a Pennant number for a warship or tail number in an aircraft. Where an identifer isn't available for that platform-type, the platform name should be entered as identifier. Up to 30 characters are allowed.
The abbreviation (up to 3 characters allowed) of platform. This an optional field.
The abbreviation (up to 4 characters allowed) of platform. This an optional field.
